cli.name: identity
cli.clicommand:
!!! Platform: ISR4451, ISR4431, ISR4321 !!! OS: IOSXE !!! Desc: Flow record, exporter, and monitor configuration for Prime Infrastructure. This configuration contains only the flow records that Prime Infrastructure can use. !!! Vars: !!! flow_collector_ipv4 !!! netflow_source_interface !!! flow_monitor_interface !!!
flow record Record-FNF-IWAN description Flexible NetFlow for IWAN Monitoring match flow direction match interface input match ipv4 destination address match ipv4 protocol match ipv4 source address match ipv4 tos match transport destination-port match transport source-port collect application name collect counter bytes collect counter packets collect flow sampler collect interface output collect ipv4 destination mask collect ipv4 dscp collect ipv4 id collect ipv4 source mask collect ipv4 source prefix collect routing destination as collect routing next-hop address ipv4 collect routing source as collect timestamp sys-uptime first collect timestamp sys-uptime last collect transport tcp flags ! flow exporter Export-FNF-Monitor-Prime description FNFv9 NBAR2 with Prime 3.1 destination $flow_collector_ipv4 !! destination flow_collector_ipv4 source $netflow_source_interface !! source netflow_source_interface transport udp 9991 template data timeout 600 option interface-table option application-table option application-attributes ! flow monitor Monitor-FNF-IWAN description IWAN Traffic Analysis record Record-FNF-IWAN exporter Export-FNF-Monitor-Prime cache timeout active 60 cache timeout inactive 10 ! interface $flow_monitor_interface !!interface flow_monitor_interface ip flow monitor Monitor-FNF-IWAN input ip flow monitor Monitor-FNF-IWAN output
